attributes.action: Restrict Gun Licences to Registered Professionals and Premises
attributes.additional_details: Gun licences of any type should be restricted solely to trained professionals who attend regular, compulsory refresher courses, whose mental health is regularly assessed by a reputable psychiatrist and whose guns are secured in a safe place, not a home, where access and removal of guns can be supervised. It must be incumbent upon anyone granting such a licence to ensure that all above details are verified. Such qualified people would be available for hire to members of the public, possibly previously licensed, who required legitimate action.
